verses.verse: Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H4578>stomach<s%> of the <S%H1710>fish,<s%>

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7121>called<s%> out of my <S%H6869>distress<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And He <S%H6030>answered<s%> me. I <S%H7768>cried<s%> for <S%H7768>help<s%> from the <S%H990>depth<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> Thou didst <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

"For Thou hadst <S%H7993>cast<s%> me into the <S%H4688>deep,<s%> Into the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> And the <S%H5104>current<s%> <S%H5437>engulfed<s%> me. <S%H3605>All<s%> Thy <S%H4867>breakers<s%> and <S%H1530>billows<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.

"So I <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I have been <S%H1644>expelled<s%> from Thy <S%H5869>sight.<s%> <S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> I will <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>'

<S%H4325>"Water<s%> <S%H661>encompassed<s%> me to the point of <S%H5315>death.<s%> The great <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5437>engulfed<s%> me, <S%H5488>Weeds<s%> were <S%H2280>wrapped<s%> around my <S%H7218>head.<s%>

"I <S%H3381>descended<s%> to the <S%H7095>roots<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> with its <S%H1280>bars<s%> [was] <S%H1157>around<s%> me <S%H5769>forever,<s%> But Thou hast <S%H5927>brought<s%> up my <S%H9132>life<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

"While I was <S%H5848>fainting<s%> <S%H5848>away,<s%> I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to Thee, Into Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

But I will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to Thee With the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%> That <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5087>vowed<s%> I will <S%H9608>pay.<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation<s%> is from the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> the <S%H1709>fish,<s%> and it <S%H9513>vomited<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> up <S%H413>onto<s%> the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land.<s%>
